name: Dark Fusion - DuckDuckGo
description: Made in a similar style to my Dark Fusion - Google theme. This theme darkens the DuckDuckGo with fully customizable backgrounds!

user.name: DeathTBO
user.about:

Under "No Redistribution" license you need to ask me to use or modify my styles. If you want to install them from userstyles.org and only apply to stylish or stylus extensions feel free to do so without asking.

additional_info:
License can be viewed here: https://userstyles.org/users/277242

Git repository: https://bitbucket.org/DeathTBO/tbos-stylish

This works best when you enable the built in dark theme because there might be some issues.

Version 1.1

Many fixes to text color. Better support for sub-features like Wikipedia results, company information, and advanced search.

Version 1.0

Initial version.
